member_organisations:
The Dun & Bradstreet WorldWide Network companies are members of, belong to, or engage with a number of relevant organisations and associations including: 
BIPA (Business Information Providers Association) - www.bipa.uk.com  
FEBIS (Federation of Business Information Services) - www.febis.org 
BIIA (Business Information Industry Association) - www.biia.com 
CICM (Chartered Institute of Credit Management -www.cicm.com 
AICD (Association of International Credit Directors)  
IAPP (International Association of Privacy Professionals) - www.iapp.org 
SCCE (Society of Corporate Compliance & Ethics) - www.corporatecompliance.org 
DMA (Direct Marketing Association) - www.dma.org.uk
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Customs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services, Fraud prevention

Better protecting the security of citizens 
Giving a new boost to jobs, growth and investment

section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: Keizer Karellaan 576 Atlantis Corner Building, 1st floor
membership:
The Dun & Bradstreet WorldWide Network companies are members of, belong to, or engage with a number of relevant organisations and associations including Business Information Providers Association (BIPA), Federation of Business Information Services (FEBIS) which includes membership of its Regulatory Affairs Group, Business Information Industry Association (BIIA), Chartered Institute of Credit Management (CICM) and its Think Tank, Association of International Credit Directors as main sponsor (AICD), Direct Marketing Association and numerous other bodies. 
Dun & Bradstreet's Worldwide Network (WWN) has 21 Partner Organisations throughout the world including Altares in France (and its territories), BeNeLux and North Africa; Bisnode in Scandinavia, Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Eastern Europe; Cribis in Italy; Crif in the Gulf States; D&B North Africa; ICAP in Greece, Bulgaria and Romania; Informa in Spain and Portugal and Interfax in Russia.
goals__remit:
Dun & Bradstreet (D&B) has been the world's leading provider of global business information for over 170 years. As per October 2018, D&B's global commercial database contains over 310 million companies located in in over 200 countries. This is by far the largest database of its kind and keeps growing, updating over 30,000 sources on a daily basis. 
 
D&B customers span both public and private sectors globally, including approximately 90% of the Fortune 500 companies.  
 
In Europe several European headquartered partners within the D&B WorldWide Network work together to make the D&B WorldWide Network us a true global company with European presence. This includes Dun & Bradstreet Belgium NV in Belgium. 
 
We help our customers to grow relationships through data. Growth is the lifeblood of business, and its most fundamental driver is the relationships a company fosters with prospects, customers and partners. 
 
Over nearly two centuries of helping businesses understand this dynamic, we have honed the expertise of how data and analytics forge the relationships that lead to industry-leading performance. To activate these capabilities, we build – or co-develop with partners – tailored solutions, whether in the area of marketing, sales, finance, supply, compliance or information technology.  
 
D&B assists governments in the areas of SME Finance, Fraud Analytics, Law Enforcement & Intelligence Agencies, Customs & Global Trade, Health & Safety, Immigration and Procurement.
